issue.title: [C++] StructArray ToString method doesn't print field names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12847](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12847). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed here (<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10343#discussion_r634466016),> StructArray prints field names as "child 0" and "child 1".
```java

> value_counts(Array$create(mtcars$cyl))
StructArray
<struct<values: double, counts: int64>>
-- is_valid: all not null
-- child 0 type: double
  [
    6,
    4,
    8
  ]
-- child 1 type: int64
  [
    7,
    11,
    14
  ]
```
